# Changes to PostCSS Preset Env

### 10.0.8

_October 23, 2024_

- Updated [`cssdb`](https://github.com/csstools/cssdb) to [`8.1.2`](https://github.com/csstools/cssdb/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#812-october-14-2024) (patch)
